issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Add perf cli driver with constraints

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: CBO
components.description: All issues dealing with Hive's cost based optimizer and its interaction with Optiq

fields.description: Till now, it was all based on stats stored for the base tables and their columns. Now the optimizer can rely on constraints. Hence, this patch is for the join reordering costing to use constraints, and if it does not find any, rely on old code path.
fields.summary: Use SQL constraints to improve join reordering algorithm
